description.author: Ilya Portnov
description.synopsis: Batch processing toolset for Linux / Unix

package-flags.name: libvirt
package-flags.description: Enable support of libvirt host controller

package-flags.name: docker
package-flags.description: Enable support of docker host controller

package-flags.name: ec2
package-flags.description: Enable support of AWS EC2 host controller

package-flags.name: linode
package-flags.description: Enable support of Linode.com host conrtoller
